name: Uppercut
description: Inflict $-$ damage to any target attribute

name: Tooth and nail
description: Inflict an ailment that causes the target attribute to lose $-$ health points during each of its next three actions

name: Calculated strike
description: Inflict $-$ damage to any target attribute. The hit and effect modifier of that attribute is reduced by the amount of damage dealt during its next action

name: Provoke
description: Inflict hit disadvantage upon a target attribute during its next action

name: Wit
description: Upon the enemy failing to hit you, inflict $-$ damage and grant your mind hit and effect advantage during its next action.

name: Faith and reason
description: Restore $-$ health points to one of your active attributes. If health is restored through this ability, your mind and soul gain a boost to their hit and effect modifiers during their next turn, based on the amount healed

name: Prayer
description: Restore $-$ health points to one of your active attributes

name: Respite
description: Remove hit and effect disadvantages on any target attribute

name: Posture of the earth
description: Inflict $-$ damage to a random attribute. If the attack causes the attribute to be deceased, your body and soul permanently gain hit and effect modifiers equal to the amount of damage dealt
